subs.text: My new XML-RPC client and server for Node.js is available. If you run XML-RPC in your world, please help test for interop. Please post notes about your experiment as an issue in the repository.

The press sighs "Oh my another distraction, keeping us from reporting real news." That's how I (failed to) quit smoking for a couple of decades. I quit for real, in an instant when a doctor said it would kill me in three years if I didn't stop.

Jim Carrey is a star. He's doing something unusual. Taking a stand in favor of our country. So many people I know, elites (for lack of a better term) are protecting their careers and tempering their criticism. It's not time for temperance, not time to play it safe.
